original_title: More than 330,000 tourists visited Sri Lanka from January to March
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's Tourism Minister reported that over 330,000 tourists arrived in Sri Lanka within the first three months of 2023.
Producing a summary report on Facebook, the Minister said that in January 102,545 visitors entered Sri Lanka, and in February that figure rose to 107,639.
However, in March the number of visitors to Sri Lanka rose to 125,495.
